Text:
First things first, WTF does this look like an advertising agency? Stick with the torrent description, never mind being a dipshit troll.

Also, I've been using Firefox since it was in Beta, and currently I use Chrome as much if not more often than Firefox. They're 2 different browsers, both with different good and bad points, and if you aren't intelligent enough to be able to know and admit this then you obviously have no business saying shit about either one.
